name: Give Me A Break! (alberteinstien)
description:
This game was created for Mini Jam 87: Break in a time period of 3 days (72 hours). It's a 3D game about a tired worker only wanting to have a break, but his boss insists that all the papers must go back in the folders. Scavenge around the office to find as much papers as you can before the time runs out, collect more paper to add extra time :D!

This game was created by Porkchop, Ayden423, Dreamerflow, BIDL, Randomperson12345 and me (alberteinstien)! :)
